name: KhanaKhazana-MostDeliciousHindiRecipes
0:
”Alexa, open khana khazana”
”Alexa, ask khana khazana to begin”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: khana khazana
des:
Khana Khazana helps in making the most delicious recipes at home and within minutes with real Human voice. Follow the steps and get your food ready within minutes.

The skill updates bi-weekly for new recipes. New recipes will be added on-demand too.

Please enter your dish name in the review section if you want to add the recipe in the Alexa skill.

Usage of the Alexa skill:

Session 1:
User: Alexa, open khana khazana
Alexa: Starting Indian recipes - <audio> - You can say, play the audio or begin, to begin.
User: Play the audio
User: begin
Alexa: Episode <number>
<Alexa completes the audio of the recipe or user interruption>
User: Alexa, next
User: Alexa, stop
User: Alexa, shuffle
User: Alexa, next / previous
User: Alexa, resume
User: Alexa, start over (to repeat the audio)
User: Yes/No


Session 2:
User: Alexa, open khana khazana
Alexa: <audio> You were listening to Indian recipes <number>, Would you like to resume?
User: No
Alexa: <Alexa starts over to the first recipe stream and you can ask Alexa to step forward by saying Alexa, next> You are listening to the Indian recipes Khana Khazana. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume. You can also replay the recipe by saying Alexa, start over

Session 3:
User: Help
Alexa: You are listening to Khana Khazana. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume. You can also replay the recipe by saying Alexa, start over



For all users in India and the rest parts of the world, the skill responses in Hindi audio. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Disclaimer
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This “Khana Khazana Indian recipes” Alexa skill is intended for fun and entertainment purposes only. It contains audios in Indian local language ‘Hindi’. Users of this skill are fully aware of the local language and accepted to play the stories with their own knowledge and experience.
